official_title: To provide for the repayment of the costs of water pumps purchased by the San Juan Suburban Water District by the Secretary of the Interior.

summary.text: Provides reimbursement by the Secretary of the Interior for the cost of water pumps purchased by the San Juan Suburban Water District, California, for installation at Folsom Dam, Central Valley Project, California.

titles.title: To provide for the repayment of the costs of water pumps purchased by the San Juan Suburban Water District by the Secretary of the Interior.
